created_by: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)
name: CurrentControlSet Autorun Keys Modification
description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
false_positives: Legitimate software automatically (mostly, during installation) sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
Legitimate administrator sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:/[Ss][Ee][Tt][Vv][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ee]/ AND registry.path:/.*\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll][Ss][Ee][Tt]\\[Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll].*/ AND registry.path:(/.*\\[Tt][Ee][Rr][Mm][Ii][Nn][Aa][Ll]\ [Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ee][Rr]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss]\\[Rr][Dd][Pp]\-[Tt][Cc][Pp]\\[Ii][Nn][Ii][Tt][Ii][Aa][Ll][Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm].*/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Ee][Rr][Mm][Ii][Nn][Aa][Ll]\ [Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ee][Rr]\\[Ww][Dd][Ss]\\[Rr][Dd][Pp][Ww][Dd]\\[Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt][Uu][Pp][Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy][Pp][Rr][Oo][Vv][Ii][Dd][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy][Pp][Rr][Oo][Vv][Ii][Dd][Ee][Rr][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Aa][Ff][Ee][Bb][Oo][Oo][Tt]\\[Aa][Ll][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Aa][Tt][Ee][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt]\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Vv][Ii][Dd][Ee][Rr][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt]\\[Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Nn][Ee][Tt][Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk][Pp][Rr][Oo][Vv][Ii][Dd][Ee][Rr]\\[Oo][Rr][Dd][Ee][Rr].*/ OR /.*\\[Ll][Ss][Aa]\\[Nn][Oo][Tt][Ii][Ff][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\ [Pp][Aa][Cc][Kk][Aa][Gg][Ee][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ll][Ss][Aa]\\[Aa][Uu][Tt][Hh][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\ [Pp][Aa][Cc][Kk][Aa][Gg][Ee][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Bb][Oo][Oo][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ii][Ff][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\\[Ii][Mm][Aa][Gg][Ee][Pp][Aa][Tt][Hh].*/)) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.Details:/\([Ee][Mm][Pp][Tt][Yy]\)/) OR (process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Pp][Oo][Oo][Ll][Ss][Vv]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND registry.path:/.*\\[Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt]\\[Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Tt][Ee][Pp][Dd][Ff]\ [Ww][Rr][Ii][Tt][Ee][Rr]\ [Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr].*/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:(/[Cc][Pp][Ww][Mm][Oo][Nn]64_[Vv]40\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ OR /[Cc][Uu][Tt][Ee][Pp][Dd][Ff]\ [Ww][Rr][Ii][Tt][Ee][Rr]/)) OR (process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Pp][Oo][Oo][Ll][Ss][Vv]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND registry.path:/.*[Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt]\\[Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ss]\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Mm][Oo][Nn]\\[Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\.[Oo][Nn][Ee][Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee]_.*/ AND winlog.event_data.User:(/.*[Aa][Uu][Tt][Hh][Oo][Rr][Ii].*/ OR /.*[Aa][Uu][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ii].*/)))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:*\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control* AND registry.path:(*\\Terminal\ Server\\WinStations\\RDP\-Tcp\\InitialProgram* OR *\\Terminal\ Server\\Wds\\rdpwd\\StartupPrograms* OR *\\SecurityProviders\\SecurityProviders* OR *\\SafeBoot\\AlternateShell* OR *\\Print\\Providers* OR *\\Print\\Monitors* OR *\\NetworkProvider\\Order* OR *\\Lsa\\Notification\ Packages* OR *\\Lsa\\Authentication\ Packages* OR *\\BootVerificationProgram\\ImagePath*)) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.Details:\(Empty\)) OR (process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\System32\\spoolsv.exe AND registry.path:*\\Print\\Monitors\\CutePDF\ Writer\ Monitor* AND winlog.event_data.Details:(cpwmon64_v40.dll OR CutePDF\ Writer)) OR (process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\System32\\spoolsv.exe AND registry.path:*Print\\Monitors\\Appmon\\Ports\\Microsoft.Office.OneNote_* AND winlog.event_data.User:(*AUTHORI* OR *AUTORI*)))))`
